EmailTemplate.name: Labs_Event_Innovation Workshop_Q315.Confirm
EmailTemplate.subject: You are confirmed to attend the Innovation Workshop
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Tuesday, September 22, 2015 Cintrifuse, Union Hall
1311 Vine Street
Cincinnati, OH 45202 {{my.Save the Date}} Thank you for registering for the upcoming Innovation Workshop.
Please contact Matt Schneider at mschneider@pivotal.io <mailto:mschneider@pivotal.io> or (513) 356-6167 with any questions. AGENDA
The day will be comprised of four 90-minute segments following an initial talk on Lean Start-up:
- Who is the prototypical customer? - What is unique value prop and how does it intersect with business vision? - Feature prioritization (similar to a Labs scoping or Day 1 inception) - Experiments and Assumptions (Risks)
